articles.title: Meghan Fletcher
articles.contents:
Meghan Fletcher
          
          
          Home
          About
          Lilly Bean
          Blog
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Meghan Fletcher
          
          
            
              Current Bren School of Environmental Science & Management master’s student focusing in Conservation Planning and Strategic Environmental Communication. University of California, San Diego graduate who specialized in ecology, behavior and evolution with a focus on marine sciences. NCAA Track and field student-athlete and two-year team captain. Particular interest in marine conservation and sustainability. Looking to utilize various creative communication strategies to inspire, engage and support underserved and underrepresented communities to aid in the remediation of various environmental injustices.

            Lilly Bean
          
          
            
              I’m a 1.5 year old golden retriever living my best life in sunny Santa Barbara. My hobbies include eating sticks, swimming and messing with my brothers, Bennie and Zoom.
